features.name: Authentication
features.description: User login, registration, Google OAuth, and RBAC middleware using JWT.

features.name: Facility Booking
features.description: Reservation system with availability checking, conflict detection using Redis locks, and pricing logic.

features.name: Championship Management
features.description: Tournament creation, fixture generation, match scoring, standings calculation, and volunteer management.

features.name: Membership & Access
features.description: Subscription tiers, payments, physical access control checks, and scholarship management.

features.name: Team & Coach Tools
features.description: Attendance tracking, player status (Traffic Light system), and travel event management.

features.name: Payments & Store
features.description: Product catalog, cart, and payment gateway integration (MercadoPago) for orders and memberships.
